channel.title: New random handler- Gnome ball anyone?
channel.description: Well, my flaxer had a gnome ball thrown to him and luckily I was there to unequip and drop it infront of the guy but this could be a new way that they're trying to stop autoers like they tried to screw up scripts on rsc, couldn't a handler be made for this?

item.title: New random handler- Gnome ball anyone?
item.dc:creator: @xSignal xSignal
item.description:
@xSignal wrote:

Weild a weapon when your running your scripts.

Read full topic
item.source: New random handler- Gnome ball anyone?

item.title: New random handler- Gnome ball anyone?
item.dc:creator: @coolboy7 coolboy7
item.description:
@coolboy7 wrote:

what I meant was that it should be made to throw the ball to the person so it’s easier to not be detected by other players…sorry for not completely explaining it correctly.

Read full topic
